column3: Latest;The Department of Immigration’s Investigation and Procedures Office  detained 105 Chinese nationals in connection with illegal online gambling.------The raid took place on the afternoon of 9 September 2019  at a 9-storey “Excelpolitan University” building on the corner of  Russian Federation BLVD
column5: Phnom Penh.------The police  arrested 105 Chinese nationals
column7: and confiscated 80 desktop computers The site is reported to have been falsely branded as a ------university ------to fool the authorities.------The Chinese nationals were sent to the Department of Investigation and Proceedings for legal action
column8: while the building has been temporarily closed. ------TDNEWS
